WorkItem.Description:
Good afternoon. I receive the following error when loading my character from Character Profiler. Please find attached the characterprofiler.lua file. I'm attempting to load Seitaer from Hydraxis. When loading, I get this error when everything is done, but the "Status" box won't close and I can't actually do anything with my character. I'm using Rawr v2.2.10.
 
See the end of this message for details on invoking 
just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.
 
************** Exception Text **************
System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
